basics.name: Ash Ketchum
basics.label: Professional Pokemon Trainer & League Champion
basics.summary: Dedicated Pokemon Trainer with 20+ years of experience in catching, training, and battling Pokemon across multiple regions. Proven track record of turning underdogs into champions. Known for exceptional bond-building abilities with Pokemon and pioneering the 'friendship-first' training methodology.

work.name: Pokemon World Championships
work.summary: Achieved lifelong dream of becoming World Champion while mentoring next generation of trainers.
highlights: Defeated Leon to claim first World Champion title, revolutionizing battle strategies with unconventional tactics
Established training program for aspiring champions, focusing on Pokemon-trainer relationship building
Pioneered new battle techniques combining type advantages with environmental factors
Represented the Pokemon League in international diplomatic missions
Maintained 92% win rate in official matches while using non-fully-evolved Pokemon

work.name: Alola Pokemon School
work.summary: Served as both student and teacher while researching regional Pokemon variations and Z-Move mechanics.
highlights: Led groundbreaking research into Z-Move implementation, resulting in 40% improvement in trainer-Pokemon synchronization
Became Alola's first Champion while maintaining full teaching schedule
Mentored diverse team of trainers, achieving 100% graduation rate
Published widely-cited paper: 'The Power of Friendship: A Quantitative Analysis of Pokemon Performance Enhancement'
Coordinated cross-regional Pokemon exchange program with Professor Kukui

work.name: Various Pokemon Leagues
work.summary: Traveled across multiple regions competing in leagues while specializing in training challenging Pokemon.
highlights: Competed in 6 regional championships, consistently placing in top percentages despite using untrained Pokemon
Successfully evolved notorious training-resistant Pokemon including Charizard and Primeape
Foiled 127 Team Rocket schemes while maintaining regular training schedule
Discovered and documented 37 previously unknown Pokemon abilities
Achieved unprecedented 100% success rate in earning gym badges across all regions

work.name: Oak Pokemon Laboratory
work.summary: Began Pokemon journey under Professor Oak's guidance, specializing in hands-on Pokemon rehabilitation.
highlights: Successfully rehabilitated and trained initially uncooperative Pikachu, establishing foundation for revolutionary training methods
Contributed to Professor Oak's research on Pokemon-human relationships
Developed emergency protocols for handling electric-type Pokemon
Created comprehensive field guide for new trainers: 'Starting Late: Making the Most of Your Last Starter Pokemon'
Established long-term research partnership with Oak Laboratory while traveling
